notes: Applies a basic dispel and disjoints projectiles upon cast.
The dispel is applied after the teleport.

If the user took damage in the last 3 seconds, Flicker blinks in place instead of a random forward direction. This means it effectively only applies the disjoint and dispel if used after having taken damage. Only reacts on damage greater than 0 from any player (including allies, excluding self) or Roshan.
This means it effectively only applies the disjoint and dispel if used after having taken damage.
Only reacts on damage greater than 0 from any player (including allies, excluding self) or Roshan.
abilities.description: Dispells debuffs and blinks you in a random forward direction for a random distance between 200 and 600. If cast within 3 seconds of receiving player damage, it will blink in place.

additionalInformation: Stacks with all other movement speed bonuses.
name: Flicker
description: The technically-true-to-his-word 'teleportation device' crafted by a notorious fae trickster.
